test_connect_successful(mocker)¶

Tests that the connect methos returns True when it successfully connects and that it sends the chunk size to the server

test_disconnect(mocker)¶

Tests disconnectAndStop() method if called when connected

test_get_input_device_dicts_input_devices(mocker, input_val)¶

Tests that getInputDeviceDicts properly filter and returns only input devices

test_get_input_device_dicts_output_devices(mocker, input_val)¶

Tests that getInputDeviceDicts properly filters for input devices. This test gives only output devices as input so it will return 0 dicts

test_get_input_device_name_content(mocker)¶

Tests that getInputDeviceNames() returns a list of the device names. This test checks that the names are all the expected ones

test_get_input_device_names_number_of_names(mocker)¶

Tests that getInputDeviceNames() returns a list of the device names and that the number of names in the list is as expected

test_handle_connect_and_start_connection_failed(mocker)¶

Test that the handleConnectAndStart() method calls start_strem when connection fails

test_handle_connect_connection_success(mocker)¶

Test that the handleConnectAndStart() method calls start_strem when connection is successful

test_set_input_device(mocker, input_vals)¶

Tests that setInputDevice properly sets the input device to the input
